comments.author: Dave
comments.body: This truly sucks... not only did I have to spend an hour in a cramped plastic tube getting bombarded by billions of sub-atomic mind-control particles (I, of course, was unaffected... no place for them to burrow in), but I also missed the season's premier of Bailey in his Smartwool (?!!) beanie. Bummer. I had a good ride before the "procedure," though. Great weather, at long last.
